abstract: Germans bomb south coast town, reptd as Southampton by Germans; London has 2 night alarms; Southampton illus; sporadic raids reptd across south, east and west Brit coasts as far as Midlands; RAF repts 604th German plane downed; new German air strategy seen; German rept on raids
snippet: LONDON, Monday, Dec. 2--A deadly hail of explosive and incendiary bombs fell for hours last night and early today on a South Coast town singled out by Axis raiders, as was Southampton on Saturday night, few a concentrated air attack....

headline.main: NAZIS REPEAT RAID; British South Coast City Is Heavily Attacked on Second Night DAYTIME FLIGHTS FITFUL Spitfires Challenge Fighter Craft of Invaders and Report Victories

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Monday, Dec. 2--A deadly hail of explosive and incendiary bombs fell for hours last night and early today on a South Coast town singled out by Axis raiders, as was Southampton on Saturday night, few a concentrated air attack.
